body: I just realized, if you search for lolicon by doing "lolicon" it gives you different results from just clicking the lolicon tag itself. I think it's exluding your blacklisted tags, I've blacklisted every language except english so that's probably why it gave such different results for me
God I wish I was Rinnosuke right about now, surprising what you can find by looking at bottom of the lolicon tag
